FUNCTION CLASSIFY TEMPERATURE (temp as integer)
BEGIN
    IF temp LESS THAN -10 THEN
        RETURN "Extremely Cold"
    ELSE IF temp IS GREATER OR EQUAL TO -10 AND less than 0 THEN
        RETURN "Very Cold"
    ELSE IF temp IS GREATER OR EQUAL TO 0 AND LESS THAN 25 THEN
        RETURN "Cold"
    ELSE IF temp IS GREATER OR EQUAL TO 25 AND less than or equal TO 35 THEN
        CONTINUE to NEXT STEP (since there's no further classification in this code)
    ENDIF
ENDFUNCTION
